analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0x50551265ba0aef89c43f9a965e58922867a6eb3a.sol:
	Contract GACT has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x50551265ba0aef89c43f9a965e58922867a6eb3a.sol#202-203)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/9/0x50551265ba0aef89c43f9a965e58922867a6eb3a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/9/0x50551265ba0aef89c43f9a965e58922867a6eb3a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/9/0x50551265ba0aef89c43f9a965e58922867a6eb3a.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
